activation.en: At the start of the Duel, place this card in your Field Spell Zone and flip it over.
activation.es: Al comienzo del Duelo, pon esta carta en tu Zona de Mágicas de Campo y voltéala.
activation.pt: No começo do Duelo, coloque este card na sua Zona de Magia de Campo e vire-o.

effect.en: All Dragon, Winged Beast, and Thunder monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.
effect.de: Alle Drache-, Geflügeltes Ungeheuer- und Donner-Monster auf dem Spielfeld erhalten 200 ATK/DEF.
effect.es: Todos los monstruos Dragón, Bestia Alada y Trueno en el Campo ganan 200 ATK/DEF.
effect.fr: Tous les monstres Dragon, Bête Ailée et Tonnerre sur le Terrain gagnent 200 ATK/DEF.
effect.it: Tutti i mostri Drago, Bestia Alata e Tuono sul Terreno guadagnano 200 ATK/DEF.
effect.pt: Todos os monstros Dragão, Besta Alada e Trovão no campo ganham 200 de ATK/DEF.
